note.p: Naturalist and pharmacist. Pharmacist, Newcastle upon Tyne, from 1855. Treasurer, British Pharmaceutical Congress, 1864–70; president, 1872–3. Served on the Council of the Pharmaceutical Society; honorary member of a number of overseas pharmaceutical societies. Regular contributor to the Pharmaceutical Journal. Published on the Foraminifera from the 1860s; studied them full-time from 1876. FRS 1874.
